TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RegistrationServices extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices.IRegistrationServices

summary.span: 提供一组用于注册和注销托管程序集以供从 COM 使用的服务。

span.span: Provides a set of services for registering and unregistering managed assemblies for use from COM.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 COM 客户端使用程序集中的对象时，需要注册。Registration is needed when the objects within an assembly are being used by COM clients. [Regasm.exe (程序集注册工具) ](/dotnet/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool)和 Microsoft Visual Studio 2005 使用由类公开的方法 来添加或删除托管程序集的启用 COM 的注册表项。The [Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)](/dotnet/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool) and Microsoft Visual Studio 2005 use methods exposed by the class to add or remove COM-enabling registry entries for managed assemblies. 你可以使用以下方法来帮助你准备注册文件：You can use the following methods to assist you in preparing a registration file: - - - - 尽管这些方法有助于收集要在注册文件中使用的信息，但它们实际上并不生成注册文件。Although these methods help in gathering information to be used in a registration file, they do not actually produce a registration file. 相反，你可以将 [Regasm.exe (程序集注册工具) ](/dotnet/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool) 工具与用于 `/regfile` 执行此任务的选项一起使用。Instead, you can use the [Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)](/dotnet/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool) tool with the `/regfile` option to perform this task. 方法不能导出和注册类型库。 methods cannot export and register a type library. 若要导出和注册类型库，可以使用 [Regasm.exe (程序集注册工具) ](/dotnet/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool) 工具和 [Tlbexp.exe (类型库导出程序) ](/dotnet/framework/tools/tlbexp-exe-type-library-exporter) 工具。To export and register a type library, you can use the [Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)](/dotnet/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool) tool and the [Tlbexp.exe (Type Library Exporter)](/dotnet/framework/tools/tlbexp-exe-type-library-exporter) tool.

span.span: Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)

summary.span: 注册托管程序集中的类以便能从 COM 创建。

span.span: Registers the classes in a managed assembly to enable creation from COM.

returns.span: 如果 包含已成功注册的类型，则为 ；否则，如果程序集不包含符合条件的类型，则为 。

span.span: if contains types that were successfully registered; otherwise if the assembly contains no eligible types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `RegisterAssembly` 为指定程序集中的类型添加相应的注册表项。`RegisterAssembly` adds the appropriate registry entries for the types in the specified assembly. 此方法还调用在程序集中找到的任何注册函数。This method also calls any registration functions found in the assembly. 使用 获取程序集。Use to get an assembly.

span.span: A user-defined custom registration function (marked with the attribute) throws an exception.

summary.span: 向 COM 注册指定的类型。

span.span: Registers the specified type with COM.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，不支持使用平台调用调用非托管的 `CoRegisterClassObject` 和 `CoDisconnectObject` 用于注册和注销 COM 对象的方法。Note that using platform invoke to call the unmanaged `CoRegisterClassObject` and `CoDisconnectObject` methods for registration and unregistration of COM objects is not supported.

param.name: type
param.span: 要注册以供从 COM 使用的 。

span.span: The to be registered for use from COM.
The used to register the specified type.

summary.span: 使用指定的 GUID 向 COM 注册指定的类型。

span.span: Registers the specified type with COM using the specified GUID.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法等效于 `CoRegisterClassObject` 在 COM 中调用。This method is equivalent to calling `CoRegisterClassObject` in COM. 方法不是原子方法，在多线程上下文中使用时，可能会导致不可预测的结果。The method is not atomic and can cause unpredictable results when used in a multithreaded context. 在版本2.0 及更高版本中，使用 方法取消注册 COM 中的类型。In version 2.0 and later, use the method to unregister a type in COM. 请注意，不支持使用平台调用调用非托管的 `CoRegisterClassObject` 和 `CoDisconnectObject` 用于注册和注销 COM 对象的方法。Note that using platform invoke to call the unmanaged `CoRegisterClassObject` and `CoDisconnectObject` methods for registration and unregistration of COM objects is not supported.

span.span: The parameter is .
The parameter cannot be created.

param.name: type
param.span: 要进行注册以供从 COM 使用的 对象。

span.span: The object to register for use from COM.

param.name: classContext
param.span: 值之一，指示将在其中运行可执行代码的上下文。

span.span: One of the values that indicates the context in which the executable code will be run.

param.span: 值之一，指定如何建立到类对象的连接。

span.span: One of the values that specifies how connections are made to the class object.

summary.span: 使用指定的执行上下文和连接类型向 COM 注册指定的类型。

span.span: Registers the specified type with COM using the specified execution context and connection type.

returns.span: 表示一个 Cookie 值的整数。

span.span: An integer that represents a cookie value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法等效于 `CoRegisterClassObject` 在 COM 中调用。This method is equivalent to calling `CoRegisterClassObject` in COM. 方法不是原子方法，在多线程上下文中使用时，可能会导致不可预测的结果。The method is not atomic and can cause unpredictable results when used in a multithreaded context. 在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 及更高版本中，使用 方法取消注册 COM 中的类型。In the .NET Framework version 2.0 and later, use the method to unregister a type in COM. 请注意，不支持使用平台调用调用非托管的 `CoRegisterClassObject` 和 `CoDisconnectObject` 用于注册和注销 COM 对象的方法。Note that using platform invoke to call the unmanaged `CoRegisterClassObject` and `CoDisconnectObject` methods for registration and unregistration of COM objects is not supported.

span.span: The parameter is .
The parameter cannot be created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `UnregisterAssembly` 删除之前由添加的指定程序集中的类型的注册表项 。`UnregisterAssembly` removes the registry entries for the types in the specified assembly previously added by . 此方法还调用在程序集中找到的任何注销函数。This method also calls any unregistration functions found in the assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，不支持使用平台调用来调用非托管的 `CoRegisterClassObject` 和 `CoDisconnectObject` 方法来注册和取消注册 COM 对象。Note that using platform invoke to call the unmanaged `CoRegisterClassObject` and `CoDisconnectObject` methods to register and unregister COM objects is not supported.
